text.title: part8_The Raveonettes on love, death, desire and war
text.p: Sune: [Laughs]

p.hi: DS: What would bother you more in bed, somebody who is overly flatulent, or somebody who speaks in a little baby voice?

text.p: Sune: Uh...probably the flatulent thing. I never really liked that so much.
Sune: Nah, the baby voice is fine.
Sharin: Ugh. God, let's see...would least want to share the bed with? I think probably the baby voice would probably bother me the most.

p.hi: DS: Creep you out a bit?

text.p: Sharin: Yeah.

p.hi: DS: Sharin do you find it difficult dating?

text.p: Sharin: Yeah. Intimacy. Obviously because you are away so much it really takes a lot of work to keep things intimate with people I am seeing when I'm away on the road.

p.hi: DS: How do you try to circumvent those problems?

text.p: Sharin: I try and keep on tour only three weeks at a time.
Sune: Which doesn't work all the time...
Sharin: I try to keep it to that and have some free time at home, which is typically, like, four days.
Sune: [Laughs]
Sharin: And then I try to communicate a lot with the phone. Skype.
text.head: On themselves

p.hi: DS: What traits do you deplore in other people?

text.p: Sune: Jealousy.
Sharin: Judgmental. Narrow-minded.
Sune: Ignorance, yeah.

p.hi: DS: Any certain type of ignorance?

text.p: Sune: Yeah, ignorance of people around them and of the world.
Sharin: And xenophobia. Racist people.

p.hi: DS: Which traits do you deplore in yourselves?

text.p: Sharin: I'm lazy. I'm uptight and inhibited.

p.hi: DS: Are you really all those things?

text.p: Sharin: Yeah.

p.hi: DS: And you deplore that about yourself?

text.p: Sharin: Well, deplore is strong. I just dislike it.

p.hi: DS: Do you do anything to get over those things?

text.p: Sharin: Yeah, I try, but it's not so easy.

p.hi: DS: But I've read interviews with you where you talk about the wild party scene in Los Angeles...

text.p: Sharin: Really?

p.hi: DS: Yeah, in preparation for this I read where you talked about that in an interview...

text.p: Sharin: That must have been me back in the day! I'm old now, you know, settled and I don't go out now anymore. I like to have fun, we have a lot of fun.
Sune: I really like myself a lot, actually. I'm in a very good state; I have my wife and I'm very happy and positive...
Sharin: Selfish!
Sune: What?!
Sharin: You're selfish.
Sune: I'm selfish? Really? You think?
Sharin: Yeah.
Sune: Is that bad?
Sharin: [Laughs]

p.hi: DS: Is that the trait that you deplore in him?

text.p: Sharin: Yeah, I would say so.

p.hi: DS: Is there a trait that you deplore in Sharin?

text.p: Sharin: I'm sure there is.
Sune: Well, she's late, and I hate that.
